Posts.Content: Sorry I got a bit confused (chemo brain) I think with your family history you should insist on visit to clinic.
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Thank goodness he listened. Probably nothing to worry about but at least it will put your mind at rest. Let me know how you get on. Hope you don't have to wait too long. Netty xx
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi CB, I couldn't feel anything in my breast but that doesn't mean that you have something there. Take some pain killers if it gets bad and try not to worry. Keep busy til your appt take your mind off it. ( I know nothing will keep your mind off it but I feel I must say it lol ) Not long to wait now, Take care Netty x
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Thats good, not too long to wait. When I went I had an examination by the doctor and chat then a mammogram and a scan. They will be able to give you preliminary results that day. Try not to worry. I'm sure you'll be ok. Let me know how you get on.   Netty x
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Good luck for tomorrow. I'll be thinking of you.   Netty xx
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi CB, Firstly don't worry about work, they will be understanding. Secondly at least your on the road to finding out whats going on. Hope you don't have to wait too long. You must be a bit frustrated ! Netty x
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi CB, I'm so sorry that you have to wait that long, its going to be hard on you. But like you say on the plus side they can't be overly concerned about it. Is it just for a scan or mammogram too? At least when you have it they will put your mind at rest there and then. Try not to think about it, keep busy with those kids lol. Give them extra home work so you can spend your evenings marking ! Seriously you'll be ok. Take care Netty xx
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: My pain was more constant, I just think you should insist on getting it checked out. Your age and family history probably mean it's nothing to worry about, but it would put your mind at rest wouldn't it? Go back to your GP and ask him to refer you. I'm doing ok thanks, mastectomy and  4/6 chemos done. Will be finished 11th feb with chemo then a bit of radiation and a year of herceptin.  Hopefully that will be the end of it ! Again good luck Netty50
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi I also went to the dr with an under arm ache. She sent me to the breast clinic for a mammogram and I was diagnosed with breast cancer that day. Insist on a visit to the breast clinic, can't do any harm.   Good luck Netty50
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi Coffeebean,   I was there all day.  9.30 - 3.30  You never know how long. I'd book the whole day just in case. You can go shopping if you're out early lol xx   Take care Netty xx
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!

Posts.Content: Hi, Course its normal to be nervous, it's the fear of what could happen. I was convinced I didn't have anything and wasn't really worried. Was supposed to meet up with friends to go shopping after my appt. lol. I'd like to tell you not to think about it but I know you will, you can't help it. Try and keep busy till your appt. Before you know it it will all be over and you can get on with your life.   Take care  Netty
Posts.Title: underarm ache, won't go away!
